directions: Add all the ingredients and toss.
Pour the Italian dressing over the top and chill for 1 hour. You can also use your favorite Italian dressing if you choose.
ingredients: 14.5 oz box tie pasta, cooked and drained
2 cups cherry tomatoes, cut in half
1 cup cherry yellow tomatoes, cut in half
½ cup cooked and crumbled bacon
3 (0.7 oz) packages Italian dressing mix, I use Good Seasons Salad Dressing mix
title: Veggie Bacon Pasta Salad
